channel.title: Why are Gateway and Workstation not distributed separately?
channel.description: Some years ago Gateway ova and Workstation ova were distributed separately. If Whonix Gateway is compatible with any other workstation OS then why cannot I download Gateway separately? Huge question.

item.title: Why are Gateway and Workstation not distributed separately?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Usability. Search term:

unified ova

Example:

Whonix VirtualBox 14.0.1.4.4 - Unified OVA Downloads - Point Release News
This is a point release. This release introduces unified ova downloads. Rather than a separate Whonix-Gateway ova and Whonix-Workstation ova download, from now, there is only a single Whonix ova which includes both Whonix virtual machines (VMs), Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation. This will reduce the steps users are required to apply (one download less / only one instead of two downloads), improve usability, make Whonix downloads more standardized compared to other software downloads, and â€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Why are Gateway and Workstation not distributed separately?
